Get feature loading from an expression matrix

Source: R/gene_matrix.R
get_feature_loading.Rd

This function calculates the feature loading of an expression matrix using PCA.

Usage

get_feature_loading(expr_matrix, npcs = 30, approx = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

expr_matrix

The gene by cell expression matrix to be used. It is expected that the matrix is already normalized and scaled.

npcs

The number of principal components to be used. Defaults to 30.

approx

Logical indicating if deterministic PCA (with prcomp) or approximate PCA (with irlba) should be used. Defaults to FALSE.

...

Aditional parameters passed to the PCA function.

Value

A gene by npcs matrix containing the feature loading.
